alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:27PM CDT until June 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COLEMAN...NORTHERN MCCULLOCH AND NORTHEASTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersview, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Stacy around 640 PM CDT. Doole and Salt Gap around 645 PM CDT. Gouldbusk around 655 PM CDT. Pear Valley around 700 PM CDT. Waldrip around 710 PM CDT. Lohn, Rockwood and Rochelle around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Whon, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Us- 283 Near The Mcculloch-Coleman County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 765 and Fife. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
